1. Add your exercise partner as a collaborator to your project repository on GitHub.
1. Clone your partner's repository.
1. Create a new branch in your collaborator's repository.
1. Add a new entry to your collaborator's project file (e.g., `.txt` or `.qmd` (if you are unsure, where to add the entry, ask your collaborator!)
1. Add and commit the changes.
1. Push the changes on the new branch to the remote repository.
1. Create a Pull Request (on GitLab: Merge Request).
1. Review the Pull Request that your collaborator made in your repository.
1. :rocket: Optional: Add additional changes on the branch pushed by your collaborator.
1. Merge the pull request into your repository.
